entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 08:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

Temperature: 5.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 12.
